data.text: Gumazamizir aghuiba ariaghirir dughiamɨn,
Gumazamizir arazir aghuibagh amiba, me ovengamin dughiamɨn,
Ekiam kamaghɨn mɨgei,
Ia gumazir akaba barazir puvatɨziba ko ifavarir gumazamizibar boriba,
“Ia asebar ziaba fasa, ian inivafɨzibar ifongiamɨn agorogem dɨkavima,
Egha ia danganir kamɨn dagɨabar gara ghaze, ian aseba dar aven iti.
Ia mɨghsɨabar ghuavanaga aseba fer danganibar ofa gamua,
Ia bar akɨrim ragha na gasara.
Ia paura ko sandan mughuriar bar isɨngtɨzim zuim uari gaghua,
Ia aseba buria ingangarir dafam uari ganɨngi,
“Ia bar tinaram atiatia,
Ia ti ghaze, ia arazir aghuibaram ami.
Egh osɨmtɨzim ia bativamin dughiamɨn, ia ti marvir guar ia akuvazir kabar dɨmtɨ,
Ikiavɨra Itir God kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze,
“Kɨrara, kɨ God, kɨ ziar bar pɨn itim ikia, egha zurara iti.
Kɨ uan gumazamiziba zurara akam me gasɨ men ataran kogham.
Me faragha bizir avɨriba iniasa, arazir kurar guar avɨribagh ami,
“Me amir arazir kuraba, kɨ dar ganigha gɨfa,
Ezɨ gumazamizir arazir kurabagh amiba, me uan arazir kuram ateghan kogham.
Nan God kamaghɨn mɨgei,
